Descrição: "One of the specific ways that the Genius Bar works is by appointment. Apple customers are encouraged to make appointments before visiting the store in order to get quick and personalized service. In some cases, this practice has become controversial for customers who would prefer to get walk-in repair service. Nevertheless, the Genius Bar service is generally part of Apple’s reputation for superior customer service and its dominant position in the consumer hardware market." Customers compare their visit to the Genius bar to their visit to the doctor
The best part? You can actually buy the lipsticks when you're done. Just select the colour you want, point the camera at yourself and you'll be able to choose your perfect shade -

OLIO connects neighbours with each other and with local shops so surplus food and other items can be shared, not thrown away.
If you love food, hate waste, care about the environment or want to connect with your community, OLIO is for you.

PVOH (Polyvinyl alcohol) is a synthetic polymer that degrades when is in contact with water and do not contaminate. It has no odor and is not toxic, and is resistant to grease, oils, and solvents. It is ductile but strong, flexible, and functions as a high oxygen and aroma barrier. It can be used to do plastic bags or other packagings.
Previous work in SONAE: A study is under development to explore the possibility of using this material in bags for groceries or dry products sold in bulk (e.g. fruits and vegetables).
How to approach?: STUDY this technology to learn who can bring it to the market, what are the associated business models, which are the challenges it can address, and what is the viability and feasibility to address them.

Descrição: Robots can be applied to a variety of food production systems to improve performance.
How to approach?: STUDY this technology to learn who can bring it to the market, what are the associated business models, which are the challenges it can address, and what is the viability and feasibility to address them.

Descrição: Artificial vision promises real time analysis of video footage to monitor, control and report any visible situation with minimal-to-none human intervention. By analyzing images collected in the stores it would be possible to identify out-of-stock items, low stock items, misplaced items, and pricing and planogram errors.
Previous work in SONAE: A study of several technologies from multiple partners has been done during 2018. The economic viability is not proved with the current data. Technical alternative are being explored based on low-cost sensors.
How to approach?: EXPERIMENT this technology building on the previous work exploring its viability and feasibility to tackle actual challenges, experimenting in the field and measuring the benefits to the business.

Descrição: Chatbots are about delivering convenience, personalization, and decision support while people are multitasking. Either for customers on the go, for allow call centers operators reach valuable information about the requirements of the multiple customers they are chatting with, or for sales associates to access details about products and customers while assisting a client.
Previous work in SONAE: A previous study and a Proof-of-concept of a chatbot is about to be launched to assist post sales needs of Continente Online customers.
How to approach?: EXPERIMENT this technology building on the previous work exploring its viability and feasibility to tackle actual challenges, experimenting in the field and measuring the benefits to the business.

Descrição: Sensors (e.g. cameras or microphones) capture customer's images or voice to be processed using algorithms. The output are details about the profile of the customers such as mood, age or gender that can be delivered to sales associates or to call center operators to deliver an appropriate service.
How to approach?: STUDY this technology to learn who can bring it to the market, what are the associated business models, which are the challenges it can address, and what is the viability and feasibility to address them.

Descrição:
Machine learning and optimization algorithms can look for and exploit observed patterns, correlations, and relationships among data elements of customer’s purchases. 
In this way, automatic suggestion of discounts based on previous and continuous purchases.
Previous work in SONAE: Smart continent APP has recommendation functionalities based in purchase history. Use other data to improve recommendation accuracy can be explored as next step.
How to approach?: STUDY this technology to learn who can bring it to the market, what are the associated business models, which are the challenges it can address, and what is the viability and feasibility to address them.

Descrição: A way of combining renewable energy with agriculture in a hot, arid landscape, positioning elevated solar panels over an understory of plants.
How to approach?: STUDY this technology to learn who can bring it to the market, what are the associated business models, which are the challenges it can address, and what is the viability and feasibility to address them.

Descrição: The Bulk Nation USA launched a program to encourage customers to bring their own containers to be filled with the products being sold in bulk at their stores. Hygiene and food safety concerns are covered in the program as well as the process to tare the containers before filling.
All-in-one solar module that includes a sun tracker and storage capacity capable of enabling off the grid buildings.

SmartWindow controls inside systems, such as ventilation and sun blinds, based on information about the outside conditions around the building. Simultaneously these systems are powered by patented integrated solar technology, making energy consumption go down, while the sustainable electricity production of the building goes up.
How to approach?: Keep VIGILANT WATCH over this technology checking up its maturity following the involved players.

Descrição: Commercial organizations and government entities can achieve greater control, reliability and security with our solar and Powerpack systems. Powerpack integrates seamlessly with solar to shave peak energy usage, lower demand charges and generate new revenue streams from grid services and demand response programs.
Tubular is the only company that measures all video content cross-platform, all-device, globally. Allowing the shift from micro influencer to nano influencers.
Sensei is a scalable, seamless store-wide solution that empowers the stores of the future to be check-out and cash free.

Robotic devices are used to improve the life and everyday activities of people with reduced mobility and with heavy tasks by using robotics and other devices that fit in our bodies. These devices helps with the movement.
Previous work in SONAE: A study about exoskeletons and other wearable for injury prevention is available. Currently an experiment in under discussion.
How to approach?: EXPERIMENT this technology building on the previous work exploring its viability and feasibility to tackle actual challenges, experimenting in the field and measuring the benefits to the business.

Descrição: polyhydroxyalkanoates (PHA) are polyesters produced in nature by numerous microorganisms, including through bacterial fermentation of sugar or lipids. PHA have active properties and act as a passive barrier to reduce food waste by prolonging food shelf life. PHA can be produced using food industry by-products, such as cheese whey and almond shells, which assure the biodegradability and recyclability, and reduce food waste.
Previous work in SONAE: The Y-pack funded project is under development to experiment 2 PHA based packages for fresh fuit: a fully renewable flow pack film and fully compostable tray.
How to approach?: EXPERIMENT this technology building on the previous work exploring its viability and feasibility to tackle actual challenges, experimenting in the field and measuring the benefits to the business.

Descrição: Structured emulsions and edible oleogels are solutions to substitute solid unhealth fats (e.g. butter) with liquid heathy fats (e.g. linen oil). This allows the production of crunchy meltable food containing fatty acids instead of saturated fats (e.g. chocolate, cookies).
Previous work in SONAE: An internal study exploring the use of oleogels to replace animal fat with linen oil in sausages or hamburgers concluded that this application is to economically viable. Other applications in sauces, chocolate or cookies were not explored.
How to approach?: Study this technology to learn who can bring it to the market, what are the associated business models, which are the challenges it can address, and what is the viability and feasibility to address them.

Descrição: The genetic metabolic analysis determines how the client digests the macronutrients (carbohydrates, proteins and fats ) which are differently digested by people. This way it is possible to recommend the diet type which is likely to work best for the client.
How to approach?: Study this technology to learn who can bring it to the market, what are the associated business models, which are the challenges it can address, and what is the viability and feasibility to address them.

Descrição: A2 milk is cow's milk that mostly lacks a form of ?-casein proteins called A1 and instead has mostly the A2 form which many believe causes the same gut problems as lactose intolerance. The australian A2 Milk Company claims that this milk is a result of breeding, not GMOs, brough this product to the market and has 10% of milk market share in Australia.
